channel.title: Subscribe to read new posts first! on victoria.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Subscribe to read new posts first! on victoria.dev

item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria Drake)
item.description: Hello! You've receiving this because someone (hopefully you) requested a subscription to my list. To complete your subscription, please let me know how you found me! Any of these links will finish signing you up. If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it as this email has not (yet!) been added to my list.

item.title: Confirmation sent! üëç
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria Drake)
item.description: I’ve sent you a confirmation email! The link will expire in about ten minutes. Please check your inbox to finish subscribing.

item.title: Oh noes üò•
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria Drake)
item.description: There was an error with your request! Please try again or let me know what happened.

item.title: Success üéâ
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria Drake)
item.description: You’ve successfully signed up! If you’re curious about how I built the sign up flow you just completed, I wrote about it in Build your own serverless subscriber list with Go and AWS.

item.title: Unsubscribed
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria Drake)
item.description: You’ve been effortlessly removed from my email list. If you’re curious about how I built the API you just experienced, I wrote about it in this post about Simple Subscribe!
